replies.body: To whoever is having doubts about whether to apply or not, go for it. It's a great experience, whether in the end you make it or not, it doesn't matter. (number) out of (number)

replies.body:
Just remember that you don't have to be super-accurate with the application, it doesn't have to be 600 words exactly. Remember that the staff are looking at the content of your app :)

Good luck!
